casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timmy SPEIGHT. No. 491PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Patricia A. Duffy, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney Generals, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*712The following order has been entered on the second motion filed on the 25th day of January 2005 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
